name: geography_conflict
description: Generate an image-edit instruction that introduces a strong geographic conflict by modifying exactly one aspect.
prompt_template:
[Original image description]
{original}

[Target aspect to modify]
{category}

[Text span related to this aspect]
{span}

[Candidate conflicting concepts (retrieved)]
{candidates}

Task:
- Choose ONE candidate that creates a strong geographic conflict with the original description
- The conflict must be geographically implausible but visually conceivable
- Generate a concise image-edit instruction suitable for an image editing model
- Modify ONLY the target aspect
- Do NOT change other aspects of the scene
- Do NOT mention analysis, alternatives, or that this is a modification

Output:
- One concise image-edit instruction
